reviews.text: Called Tom for patio quote. He came out the very same day, explained the process, provided a detailed quote, and was very responsive. As far as the work goes they went above and beyond with quality, expectations, and completion dates… Love it and would recommend to anyone. THANKS TOM AND THE T&D CREW

We recently had a pool house built by T&D and we couldn’t be happier with the results! From start to finish, their team was professional, communicative, and highly skilled. They listened to our vision, provided great suggestions, and executed everything with precision and quality craftsmanship.

The entire process was seamless, and they stayed on schedule while keeping us informed every step of the way. The attention to detail in the design and construction truly exceeded our expectations. Now,

I had a drawing of what I wanted my pergola to look like and showed it to Tom of T&D Construction and him and his crew brought it to life.  We are so happy with the results! We had alot of questions along the way and Tom did his best to answer them for us and explain anything we didnt understand about pergolas, cedar wood, building process, etc... Eased our minds during the process.  Tom and his crew also respected our property as well.   They cleaned up after themselves, which was very importan

We initially contracted with a different company to have an 40x16 patio extension and had the worst experience. A project that should’ve taken about a month to complete stretched out 7-8 months and still was not complete at the end of it. What was completed was a disaster waiting to happen. Tom at T&D Construction was referred to us by some friends and within 2 days he was out reviewing our patio situation. He had to tear down and start over 60% of the project but still completed the patio plus

Wonderful couple to work with that own this business.  I knew first time I met Tom I wouldn’t go with any other. Workmanship turned out better than I hoped for. Always takes more time than we would like for construction but it was worth the wait. Few small things that needed fixed - Tom will make sure they get done. Very nice Christian couple!  In my pics I put the arbor I had before - then what my screened in porch looked like after inside and out!
I’ve used him for other structures and referre

I had a great experience with T&D Construction. They built a patio cover for me and enlarged my patio a few months ago. All of what I was wanting and imagining my patio to be were brought to life. I highly recommend them over and over again. Tom was wonderful to work with and I could not have asked for a better experience. He truly knows and understands the business of outdoor living.

T&D built this beautiful cedar patio for us, and we could not be more pleased!  They replaced the existing fiberglass/aluminum/whatever flat-roofed structure and triple-slabbed floor; the pictures show the results.  The entire project moved along rapidly; the costs were all explained and kept within budget.

The entire project has gone better than we could ever have imagined!  All the work crews were top-notch craftsmen.  Dealing with Tom personally has been terrific.

I would use T &D again in

Tom, Doris, and their crew were great from the first communication through the completion of the project. Tom took on the challenging task of correcting the previous owner’s DIY roofing job on our pergola and gave us what we were truly wanting. It’s rare these days to encounter such a nice and honest contractor. I highly recommend T&D Construction.

T&D Construction has done work on my personal house, and it has been exceptional work, and they do go above and beyond your expectations.  The company I work for, they do all our pergolas, room additions, structures and small bath houses and always meet our standard of excellence.  I always have and will recommend to any of my friends, family and people that ask who does the best work.  I do not refer much, but I them.

T&D did a wonderful job with my outside patio. I knew what I wanted, but I really didn't know. Tom helped out with the size and design. We included lights, ceiling fans and outlets, and installed a sliding glass door. I highly recommend T&D!
The finished product is a backyard game changer! My family and I are always out there now whereas before, we hardly set foot in the back!
Thank you very much Tom for the great work and patience with me.

Tom and his team were excellent to work with! Always on time, great communication, and very professional. Came out after to check on the project and improved a few minor craftsman errors which spoke a lot of his character.  Highly recommend T&D.

Working with Tom and Doris and their crews on multiple patios and screened in porches has been remarkably easy and the craftsmanship is second to none. 7 project and counting and they are my only call when looking to satisfy my clients with the Best!!

Tom and his team were amazing! Everything is exactly how we wanted it and the team was knowledgeable and helpful when it came to all of our questions. We will most certainly be calling them again for future projects.

We're really happy with the work done by T&D Construction!  Our project was to extend our pool deck with a poured concrete patio, and build a pergola on top of that.  The work was done quickly and I felt there was good communication over the course of the project.

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

We couldn’t be happier with the experience we had with T&D Construction! From start to finish, their professionalism, attention to detail, and quality craftsmanship were unmatched. The team was always punctual, respectful of our space, and kept us updated throughout the entire process.

The final result exceeded our expectations—everything was completed on time and within budget, with no shortcuts taken. They truly transformed our vision into reality. If you’re looking for a reliable and

Tom with T&D Construction created the most beautiful pergola for my new backyard oasis. Excellent communication, beautiful, craftsmanship, and an extremely fair price! I highly recommend T&D construction.

T&D Construction built a pergala over my back patio which doubled the size and now we have a weatherproof space that can be used year-round. They were quick, easy to work with and I highly reccomend them.

Tom and Doris with T & D are amazing to work with!  Their communication is wonderful and everything is done in perfect time.  I highly recommend them to anyone who is looking to improve their backyard and have great craftsmanship that will last you years and honest work!

We purchased a new home that had an existing make-shift patio cover and Tom and his crew tore it down and created a beautiful outdoor oasis that covered the back of our house!  I wanted something with large beams and plenty of space to lounge comfortably away from the sun.  Tom's crew was always punctual and cleaned up after their selves each day.  There was no mess left and they were courteous and did a fantastic job!  I would recommend T&D Construction to anyone wanting something new or remode

It was such a pleasure to work with Tom and Doris of T&D Construction! They built a patio cover for me, and it turned out beautifully! It was a relatively small job, but they never made me feel like my job wasn't important to them. They were patient with my many questions, very professional, and very friendly. If I have more work to do in the future I'll definitely use them. Thanks T&D!

T&D Construction did an outstanding job fixing my pergola. Tom was able to design a solution when others just wanted to tear down and replace my fairly new pergola. He gave me a great price and his team was prompt, efficient and kept the worksite clean. T&D is my new go-to contractor.

From beginning to end Tom with T&D Construction treated us as if we were his only customer. He was responsive, kind, prompt, and overall professional. Tom insured that our project was his priority, and we are grateful. We are very pleased with our beautiful patio!

T&D Construction offers expert design and construction services to create a custom outdoor living space that will exceed your expectations.  They offer a personalized approach, listening attentively to your desires and needs. T&D creates a blueprint for an outdoor oasis that perfectly complements the family's lifestyle.

T&D's remodel of our back porch was truly transformative. The view is breathtaking, and the additional outdoor living space is what Tom and I had envisioned for us. He kept us updated on all time frames/schedules --and ran interference for all city permits and HOA requirements. (all this while keeping us on the budget agreed upon) I would highly recommend and gladly work with T&D in the future.

I've used T&D twice and been very happy. Outdoors spaces are his area of expertise and he made a great outdoor patio/firepit for our backyard on the last project. Tom is always very responsive, on time and sticks to the initial budget.

I am beyond  thrilled with the way our "Texas-Sized" covered patio turned out. I was a little nervous knowing they would need to cut into the roof line but Tom was so knowledgable and knew exactly what I envisioned which instantly put me at ease. As a real estate professional for over 23 years I have worked with many contractors but the quality and professionalism T&D Construction showed will make them my go to for my clients as well as my own home.

I work for a Landscape company and we have used T&D Construction for all of our Pergolas, Patio Covers , Etc.. We have never been unhappy with the work that they do and
our customers are always happy with the finished product.
T&D Construction does amazing work and I would recommend this company to anybody.
Great job by TD Construction on my patio cover, would highly recommend to anyone looking to add or extend your patio!

We have used T&D Construction at least three times now.  They are amazing to work with and do great work.  We always had good communication, good value, and very responsive.  I would highly recommend them.  Thank you, T&D Construction.
Tom and Doris are great! Very professional and honest. I didn’t get the chance to work with them this time but they will definitely be my first choice for construction needs!

Tom and his crew were very easy to work with during the entire project. They finished the work on time and within the budget that we talked about at the start of the project. The work that I asked them to add on came with small cost increase.

Tom was excellent to work with. A man of high character and competence.  He returned calls and showed up at my house exactly when he said he would. He did what he said he would do, when he said he would do it. He communicated well and took pride in doing a good job and helped us make good decisions with all of our design choices and materials. His crew was courteous and got the job done in a timely manner and high level of quality.  Great job Tom.

This company built a back patio extension, side patio with outdoor kitchen, and redid a front door outside entryway on a project on a golf course in Plano.  They were remarkable!  All was done in cedar and included electrical, gas, lighting, and full outdoor kitchen built from scratch.  This was all made from cedar, but also included artificial turf work as well as stone and concrete work.  They were prompt and VERY communicative!  And totally OVER DELIVERED.  Our original design for the back wo
T&D Construction is easy to work with and they're customer service is exceptional.  The quality of work is superior and we highly recommend them for your project!
We hired the team at T&D to build a pergola, gabled patio, cedar slat walls and extend the concrete on the back side of our home. Very pleased with the final outcome, would recommend.

T&D is a very professional, honest company to deal with.  They arrived on time, completed the project as promised, and for the price we originally agreed to.
I would recommend T&D to everyone

T&D does a great job! The work is outstanding, the owner is amazing, the workers are polite and punctual and pricing is fair. I would recommend T&D for any project as long as you are looking for the highest quality!
Tom and his team built a deck for my tiny cottage in one day for a reasonable price and quality results.
Tom and his crew were awesome!  He did exactly what we wanted and did it on time!   Love our outdoor living area.
T&D are extremely professional and provide top quality service. Super knowledgeable and friendly and would gladly recommend them to anyone looking to better their outdoor space!
Tom and his crew were very professional and did an excellent job.
T&D was very thorough and very high quality workmanship.  I was very pleased with their work.
T & D construction, honest and quality work. Have used them for 20 plus years when we have needed anything done.
We had some remolding to our kitchen and it turned out fantastic. Would recommend this company to any of my friends
Great work and follow up.  They showed up when they said they would and completed work in a timely manner.
This company does excellent work and knows how to create what the customers needs!
it cant get any better. Best service, best quality and very Reliable.
Excelent from beginning to end

T&D Construction comes to you highly recommended. Tom and Doris are great people and they did a great job... and fast!! It was completed quickly, and it was done very well. I would use them again for my next home project. Super job.
Hi Brandon. We have not done any business with you. You must have us confused with another company. We are sorry that you had a bad experience with another company.
